hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I wanna share

it's kind of like a honey fig focaccia
it's so good it's really simple and
really really easy but since figs are

active dry yeast with a little more
sugar olive oil and some water you want
to make sure you water as is nice and
warm you don't want to be at room
temperature it needs to be about 115
degrees Fahrenheit otherwise if it's too
cold your yeast is not going to activate
and if it's too hot it's gonna burn the
heat so what fun is that going to do all
right in my water I'm just going to add

usually
